name: the little dark ghost between the lines
description: As my first NFT I want to introduce you to that little Sir that lives hidden between the lines. Maybe you haven't seen it yet, but look closer to your notebook. He's waiting for you to start creating just to steal your ideas. Don't you remember that last time you forgot something you were about to write or sketch? Ehhh, that naughty ghost. I wonder what's on the other side of the paper, where he collects all your missing ideas... Does it maybe look like this platform?
